explains: n. 七十五；总数七十五；七十五个……；……中的第七十五个；75毫米的枪

sentences.en: A carpenter will build a luxurious model for about seventy-five dollars.
sentences.cn: 一个木匠将花费大概75美元建造一个豪华模型。

sentences.en: I realized this a day later, when I saw newspaper advertisements for the set at seventy-five dollars less than I had paid.
sentences.cn: 一天后，我在报纸上看到这台电视机的广告，价格比我当时买的时候少了75美元，我这才意识到了这一点。
